casebody.data:
TESAR INDUS. CONTRS., INC.
v.
REPUBLIC STEEL 2018-1180 Supreme Court of Ohio. October 10, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion for stay of judgment pending appeal. Motion granted and supersedeas bond continued.

O'Connor, C.J., and French and DeWine, JJ., dissent.
